dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: I will take you, but not you.

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: Oh, Who am I kidding? I can't leave you

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: Hello!

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: Wait! Hey! Wait! Wait! Stop!

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: Excuse me.

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: I was looking for... diversion!

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: What?

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: So long, sucker!

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: I hurt all over.

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: Wait! I know you.

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: No, you don't. I get that a lot.

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: I look like a lot of people.

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: No, no, no. I do.

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: Bing Bong! Riley's imaginary friend!

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: You really do know me?

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: Well, of course!

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: Riley loved playing with you! You two are best friend!
dialogues.ko: 라일리는 너랑 노는 걸 좋아했어! 너희는 최고의 친구잖아.

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: You would know. We're trying to get back to headquarters.
dialogues.ko: 너는 알겠다. 우리는 본부로 다시 돌아가려고 해.

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: Headquarters? You guys are from headquarters?

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: Well, yeah. I'm Joy. This is sadness.

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: You're Joy? The Joy?

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: What the heck are you doing out here?

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: That's good question. You want to answer that, sadness?

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: Without you, Riley won't ever be happy.

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: We can't have that. We got to get you back.

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: I'll tell you what. Follow me!

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: Thank you!

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: It is so great to see you again.

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: I gotta tell you, I am such a huge fan of your work.

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: Do you remember when you and Riley were in a band?

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: I went to all of your concerts

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: Yeah, I blow a mean nose.

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: Watching you play tag was such as treat.

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: tow-time word champ.

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: And remember your rocket?

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: Of course! It runs on song power!

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: That's right! Your theme song!

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: ♬Who's your friend who likes to play?♬

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: ♬Bing bong, bing bong.♬

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: ♬His rocket makes you yell 'hooray!'♬

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: Bing bong, bing bong.

dialogues.speaker: Sadness
dialogues.en: What exactly are you supposed to be?

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: You know, it's unclear. I'm mostly cotton candy.

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: But shape-wise I'm part cat, part elephant, part dolphin.

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: Dolphin?

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: You got to remember, when Riley was three, animals were all the range.

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: The cow goes moo. The horse goes neigh.

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: That's all people talked about back then.

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: Yeah, Yeah. I guess that's true

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: What are you doing out here?

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: Well, there's not much call for imaginary friends lately.
dialogues.ko: 뭐, 요즘은 상상 속의 친구를 별로 부르지 않잖아.

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: So I, you now...

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: Hey, hey. don't be sad. Tell you what.

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: When I get back up to headquarters, I'll make sure Riley remembers you.

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: You will?

dialogues.speaker: Joy
dialogues.en: Of course! She'd love that.

dialogues.speaker: Bing Bong
dialogues.en: This is the greatest day of my life!
